notes:
Invisible characters. Add "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%" or "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in launch options to fix this. However, the latter glitches the background graphics in the main menu.

Other than that the game ran fine. Sound, dialogue, controls, changing settings, Music Room, everything worked. Played through stages 1 and 2 without issues.
title: 永遠消失的幻想鄉 ～ The Disappearing of Gensokyo
